DOC.brief_title: Study Tetrathiomolybdate Patients With Wilson Disease
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This double blind , randomize study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive tetrathiomolybdate ( TM ) 3 time day meals 3 time day meal 8 week absence neurologic deterioration unacceptable toxicity . Arm II : Patients receive trientine therapy 8 week absence neurologic deterioration unacceptable toxicity . Additional therapy ( study ) : Patients TM group may receive maintenance zinc , trientine group may continue trientine switch zinc .
